jcurses.widgets
Class DefaultLayoutManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jcurses.widgets.DefaultLayoutManager
public class DefaultLayoutManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LayoutManager, WidgetsConstants

This is a default layout manager. The constraints state for each widget to layout a coordinates of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed and the alignment of the widget, if its preferred size is smaller as the rectangle's size-

addWidget

public void addWidget(Widget widget,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      int verticalConstraint,
                      int horizontalConstraint)
Adds a widget to the boundeb container
Parameters:
widget - widget to be added
x - the x coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed
y - the y coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed
width - the width of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed
height - the hight of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed
verticalConstraint - vertical alignment constraint. Following values a possible: WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_CENTER,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_TOP,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM
horizontalConstraint - vertical alignment constraint, Following values are possible: * WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_CENTER,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_LEFT,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_RIGHT

public void removeWidget(Widget widget)
Removes a widget from the container
Parameters:
widget - widget to be removed
